data: Go to Songwriting r/Songwriting • Odd-Elk-3458 日本語 Türkçe Español (Latinoamérica) Criticism I have noticed that a lot of us musicians struggle to take criticism about our music. But without criticism how can musicians expect to improve? We tend to be defensive about our music, most times we might even think we are better than we are because we haven't had the kind of criticism we need to improve or we blatantly ignore those who dare tell us our music is lacking. I used to be that way, But I have now personally learnt to embrace criticism as it fuels me to work on my musical weaknesses and therefore always striving to improve. Read more Share
